attributes.name: Baidu: ERNIE 4.5 VL 28B A3B
attributes.description: A powerful multimodal Mixture-of-Experts chat model featuring 28B total parameters with 3B activated per token, delivering exceptional text and vision understanding through its innovative heterogeneous MoE structure with modality-isolated routing. Built with scaling-efficient infrastructure for high-throughput training and inference, the model leverages advanced post-training techniques including SFT, DPO, and UPO for optimized performance, while supporting an impressive 131K context length and RLVR alignment for superior cross-modal reasoning and generation capabilities.
